SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Engineering Department relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Engineering Department is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Engineering Department}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Employee Satisfaction level recorded for Engineering Department?
What is the lowest Employee Satisfaction level recorded for Engineering Department?

SC.Q: What is the average total Employee Satisfaction?
SC.A: The average total employee satisfaction is {192.66} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Satisfaction go below 200 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1986, did the total Employee Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total employee satisfaction between 1966 and 1986 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total Employee Satisfaction in 1970 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total employee satisfaction in 1970 was {about the same} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1981, did the total Employee Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total employee satisfaction between 1964 and 1981 was {larger} than between 1974 and 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Employee Satisfaction in 1979 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total employee satisfaction in 1979 was {about the same} than in 1985.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Engineering Department} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Management Team, Engineering Department}.
